\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\&\& I \& I \\
	\&\& X \& {Y\oplus I} \& {Z \oplus I} \& {\,} \\
	{\,} \&\& X \& Y \& Z \& {\,} \&\& {\,}
	\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=1-5]
	\arrow["{\binom 01}", from=1-4, to=2-4]
	\arrow["{\binom 01}", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{\binom fi}", from=2-3, to=2-4]
	\arrow[equals, from=2-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow["{\binom {g \ 0}{c \ 1}}", from=2-4, to=2-5]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", from=2-4, to=3-4]
	\arrow["{\delta''}", from=2-5, to=2-6]
	\arrow["{(1,0)}", from=2-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=3-4]
	\arrow["g", from=3-4, to=3-5]
	\arrow["\delta", from=3-5, to=3-6]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
